name: wolfslice
text: A comment left by wolfslice was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by stormypinkness, pwb, boojit)

name: soylimpio
text: and why is he wearing terrible long underwear?

name: saint
text:
mustard colored skin? not what I had in mind.
that, and, the way the words are written, sounds like Vlad on the phone!

name: afrothunder
text: Could it be possible that this IS Vlad on the phone?

name: ketamind
text: A comment left by ketamind was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by twntysevn27, anticitizen, fancypants)

name: rowboat
text: You were under the correct assumption.

name: deusoma
text: Maybe a little bit darker, but yeah, pretty much.

name: rational
text: All along he was Winnie the Pooh's crass cousin. Who knew?

name: doctorbeene
text: It is the color of anger over past non-canadian bacon pizzas.

name: overmedicated
text: Teodor is a WHITE BEAR!

name: deimosrising
text: Teodor is white, Ray is white...just which characters aren't white, overmedicated? or should I say...DIXIE DAN?!

name: kazad
text: HAHA! Yeah...it's weird but great how such a complex, colorful (forgive the pun) strip is so much better in simple black and white...

name: gormster
text: Ray is grey.

name: belgand
text: Raymond is brown. Roast Beef is grey. It always looks odd to me.

name: soticoto
text: Pat is pink, but they couldn't show it early on as it would have been a chronic spoiler.

name: nexus
text: A comment left by nexus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by jlaw, lamboyster, Overmedicated, Jesler729, solobuttons, equinn2006, usversusthem, Audhumla, ashoykh, carterst, slalvation)

name: rowboat
text: Folks hate your opinion.

name: jamers
text: Eh, color issues aside, I have had this experience on the phone many times. If only they were all love stories.

name: alejandroadam
text: I have been on both sides of this conversation

name: zefiel
text: Just the other day I was phoned by an american, out of the blue. I know what you mean.

name: hamscout
text:
It's like trying to carry on a phone conversation with one of those browser-based "soundboards" of celebrity audio clips...

"I love canadian bacon"... "arrggghh"... "I kill you last"... "now... plain zero"

name: behka
text: i don't understand why everyone doesn't have this at a solid five.  this is one of my top five.

name: deancain29
text: it is a love story!

name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, crawfomp, farqussus, fancypants)

name: achewoodno1fan
text:
english very good language! i took english class 5 year!
English pizza take my class!

name: sargasm
text: Looks like Hajul wasn't always an electrical engineer.

name: aperson
text: But English Speaking Pizza telephone man has the cadences and linguistic mannerisms of an inhabitant of the Indian subcontinent, not those of an East Asian.

name: sargasm
text: Hajul is the only man on this planet with the tenacity required to do anything a thousand times, be it loving English or quitting phone calls.

name: philosophe
text: But Hajul is indeed a "fancy son of a bitch from India".

name: aperson
text: Dang, that's the case. But he talks like an east asian in that other strip. Maybe Cropes is Ignorant of Foreign Cadences. He is after all a simple man.

name: paperboy_2000
text:
When I read the strip, I always hear Manuel from the Moose/Germans episode of Fawlty Towers .

"Hello. How are you? I speak Eng-a-lish! I learned it... from a book!"

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Silly-ass pizza installment!"

name: rowboat
text: I unofficially retract this lame. When I gave it, I didn't realize that you were performing a service which was, at the time, helpful.

name: farqussus
text: i have a lot of this to do through the archives.

name: el_cameroni
text: I get the feeling that Lie Bot has opened a pizza place... He can speak English, but he'll get your order wrong anyway.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: ehh. when i look at these earlier colour strips, i think onstad gets the colours almost right, but for some reason decided to use each colour's pukiest incarnation.

name: yomimono
text: Maybe he coloured them in England.

name: luckypyjamas
text: again with the tiny phonebook

name: bananacup
text: For some reason I always thought of Phillipe as some sort of light blue color before seeing the first color strips.

name: salvar
text: I wish Taco Bell could feel love like this.

name: johnnyrocker
text: fuck this one made me laugh at every panel

name: dysphemism
text:
Jesus.
This has to be my sixth time through the archive, and that last panel still made me nearly choke to death on my yoghurt.
WHEN WILL I LEARN

name: wiliamthepleasr
text: It's like an old friend bent on your asphyxiation.  You weren't expecting it, but you totally should have been.

name: greenkoolayd
text: this strip is dumb.

name: woodenteeth
text:
Dear Mr. Onstad, I do not understand the device involved in Panels 3 and 5, other than "I don't want to repeat the same panel of Tacodor speaking but I don't want to manipulate his stance, wait I know I have an archived drawing of a window sill".

It is a fine representation of a window sill sir.

name: soup_alex
text: In which Téodor asks an English-Speaking Pizza representative to prove that he (Téodor) has been duped by "English-speaking" pizza places before now.
